## Quaternion.set() method

Updates the current quaternion from the given float coordinates

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
set(x: number, y: number, z: number, w: number): Quaternion;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | <code>number</code> | defines the x coordinate |
|  y | <code>number</code> | defines the y coordinate |
|  z | <code>number</code> | defines the z coordinate |
|  w | <code>number</code> | defines the w coordinate |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Quaternion`

the updated current quaternion
